Detailed Description

template<size_t N>
class rev::FrameBufferQueue< N >

Class representing a set of FBOs to be updated.

Used to implement double or triple buffering

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ FrameBufferQueue()

template<size_t N>
template<typename ... BufferArgs>
rev::FrameBufferQueue< N >::FrameBufferQueue ( BufferArgs &&...  args)
inline

Initialize queue however one would a buffer.

Note
Variadic template is used to avoid having to modify this if buffer initialization changes
